name: CopyCat! (TriJam#206)
description:
CopyCat (TriJam#206)

A brain challenge. How many patterns can you remember?

The theme of this jam was "just another copy". Well.. All you have to do, is "copy, what you see" -- easy, isn't it? ;-)

Development time: I stopped after 3 hours but the engine behind can create hundreds of levels -- this is a nice prototype of a braingame that might become a full game one day!

Enjoy!

Yours, Gris
